string.value: You don't appear to be in any games right now...
{0} has summoned the heroes. Avengers Assemble!
The heroes have been summoned by {0}. Avengers Assemble!
{0} has summoned the heroes. Avengers Assemble!
The heroes have been summoned by {0}. Avengers Assemble!
You can't join now! The mission is already in progress.
You've already joined!
1 minute left to Join
{0} seconds left to Join
Not enough heroes, Avengers dismissed!
Game is starting, please wait while I assign roles and update the database.
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /)
{0}, please change your name to join
Sorry, max player limit has been reached!
{0} has joined the mission. {1} players, {2} minimum, {3} max
{0} Please click the start button below or {1} and start me, so I can PM you your role. You may not join the mission until you do.
You can't run away! YOU'RE DEAD! Get back in the ground... jeez!
{0} has been dismissed!
{0} players remain.
Hey I didn't ask you anything yet!
You don't seem to be playing...
I can't find a player by that name!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to kill {1}.
{0} has voted to eliminate {1}.
{0} has not voted for 2 nights in a row. Thanos snaps his finger and turns {0} into dust. {1}
You traitor!!! You are now a Henchman of Thanos...
Choice accepted.
\nThe Master of the Mystic Arts is {0}.
{0} was the Master of the Mystic Arts. As the apprentice, you step up to become the new Master.
{0} was an apprentice, and has now stepped up to fill {1}'s place as the new Master of the Mystic Arts.
You see {0} is {1}!
Who do you want to eliminate?
Who do you want to identify?
Who do you want to blow up? {0} missile(s) remain.
Who do you want to cuddle?
Who do you want to see?
Who do you want to guard?
Who do you want to kill?
Who do you want to interrogate?
Who is your pick?
Who do you want to corrupt and convert to your order?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and

You are Bucky Barnes, the Winter Soldier 😾. You are an agent at this time, but your mind remains fragile as a result of the experiments by HYDRA. If your code is activated, you will become a Henchman of Thanos.

You are Heimdall 🕵️‍♂️, Guardian of the Bifrost. You see and hear everything that happens across the nine realms. During the day, you may choose a player to identify their role. However - in doing so, your role could be revealed to Thanos! (40% chance)

You are the friendly neighbourhood Spiderman 🍻. When attacked by Thanos or his Henchmen, your heightened spidey sense will alert you, allowing you to use your web shooters to disable them. You will die but the Henchmen will be unable to attack the next day.

You are Vision 👼, the sentient android. Out of compassion and love for humanity, you may choose to guard a player each night. However, if you choose Thanos or one of his Henchmen, there is a 50% chance you will malfunction.

You are the genius billionaire, playboy and philanthropist, Iron Man 🔫. You have two Jericho missiles at your disposal. During the day, you may choose to shoot at another player. Everyone will hear the explosion, and know you are Iron Man (not a Thanos Henchman).

You are Black Widow 💋, the badass super-spy. Despite your tough demeanour, you have a sensitive side and love cuddling. During the night, you may choose to visit another player, to cuddle. However--if you visit Thanos or a Henchman, or visit someone killed by Thanos, you will die. If you do go to visit though, and Thanos tries to kill you at your home, you will survive.

You are Baron Mordo 🖕, former member of the Mystic Arts. For now, you are good but your loyalty wavers! Once all of Thanos’ Henchmen are dead, you will switch allegiances and become a Henchman yourself. If the Master of the Mystic Arts looks to you, you may or may not be identified as a Henchman.
You are Chitauri 🐺, a Henchman of Thanos. Each night you can choose to kill someone.
You are the Master of the Mystic Arts 👳‍♂️. Each night, you may choose a player to 'see', and reveal their role to you.
You are an agent of S.H.I.E.L.D 👱‍♂️, doomed to die fighting Thanos and his henchmen.
You are Loki 👺, God of Mischief. If the Avengers choose to eliminate you, you can use deceptive illusions to escape unharmed and win automatically!

You are the Incredible Hulk 👶! Pick a player to be your 'loved one' - if they die, you go into an uncontrollable rage and your mind becomes vulnerable. Thanos will use his mindstone to turn you into a Henchman.
You are the Ancient One 👁, Leader of the Mystic Arts and Sorcerer Supreme. You will be able to identify your prodigy - that is your only function.
You are Wong 🙇‍♂️, apprentice to the Master of the Mystic Arts. If the (real) Master dies, you will take their place as the new Master.
You are an agent of HYDRA 👤. Every night, you may choose a player to corrupt and convert. If all remaining living players at the end are HYDRA agents, they win.

You are Nick Fury 💂‍♂️, Director of S.H.I.E.L.D, trying to stop HYDRA from corrupting everyone! Each night, choose a player to interrogate. If they are a HYDRA agent, they die. If HYDRA tries to corrupt you, their newest member dies
The day draws to a close, and the Avengers assemble to eliminate the enemy... Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote!
It is now day time. All of you have {0} seconds to make your accusations, defenses, or just talk.
Night has fallen. Everyone heads to bed, weary after another stressful day of fighting crime. Night players: you have {0} seconds to use your actions!
Amid doubts and suspicions, The Avengers have chosen to eliminate {0}. {1}
Unable to come up with a proper decision on who to eliminate, the Avengers return to the Facility for the night, frustrated...
Something is fishy, for no one voted! No eliminations tonight...
The Avengers assemble in the morning, but do not see {0}. They wander over to the Bifrost Bridge, to find {0} with his sword shoved way up where the sun don't shine. RIP.
Morning comes, and to everyone's dismay, {0} displays the error message “Android.exe has stopped responding”. No data was recovered.

As everyone gathers at the HQ, they find dismantled scrap pieces of Red and Gold armour dispersed in the streets... then legs... then fingers... then the body of {0}, lying in the streets. You have lost Iron Man.
The Avengers awake in the morning, to find the disemboweled remains of {0} hunched over the eye of Agamotto. The Master of the Mystic Arts is dead.
Everyone wakes up to the nauseous smell of insecticide sprayed around the facility grounds. The remains of {0} are found. The web-slinger has been exterminated.

As the sun rises, the Avengers gather to find a lifeless body in the streets. Dormammu has deceived {0} and stolen his eternal soul! But no one cares because he wasn't the real Master of the Mystic Arts...
As everyone rises in the morning, they find a trail of blood. They follow the trail to find the body of {0} ripped apart, with their head missing. Ugh!\n{1}
A loud scream is heard coming from {0}'s house... the Avengers inspect to find a body lying on the floor. A HYDRA agent has been beaten to death by Nick Fury!
The Avengers assemble the next morning at the Facility, to sighs of relief - it appears there was no attack the previous night.
Your trigger word has been activated. You are now a Henchman of Thanos and will be his personal assassin!
Your Henchman counterpart(s): {0}
{0}’s trigger word was activated... The sleeper agent is now on your side! Congrats on your new teammate!
Oh no! Thanos and his Henchmen have murdered you! They proceed to violate what's left of you in every way possible... Yikes!
Oh no! {0} was Spiderman and used his webshooters to disable you! Now you are incapacitated, and can't attack tomorrow night...
You tried to guard Thanos or his Henchmen! Android.exe has stopped responding.
You have saved {0}'s life!
{0} was not attacked, so you didn't do much of anything.
You went to guard {0}, but they weren't home!
Vision was watching over you last night and fought off an attacker!
Black Widow chose the wrong night to stay home. {0} has been fatshamed mercilessly by Thanos and his Henchmen! Her insecurities start to kick in and she starves herself to death...
Odd... {0} was not home! No trolling tonight for you...
You slip into {0}'s house for a nice cuddle, only to be confronted by Thanos and his Henchmen. You are screwed. *heh*
{0} slipped into the wrong house last night! {0}'s remains are found in the trash…
{0} slips into {1}'s house, ready to have a nice cuddle to ease off the stress. Instead, {0} finds Thanos and his Henchmen violating {1}! The Henchmen quickly turn on {0} and... {0} is dead.
You see {0} is not a threat, as you cuddled all night long!
It was a bit dark, so you couldn't see well enough, but in the middle of the night you wake up to Black Widow cuddling you. At dawn, they slip back out silently...
Thanos senses the presence of Heimdall…. That must be {0}!
You’ve identified {0} as {1}.
Looks like {0} got a little overexcited after cuddling with Black Widow! Iron Man’s defence mechanisms were activated prematurely. {1} is dead.
Suddenly, everyone hears a loud explosion. The Avengers turn to see {0} standing over {1}'s incinerated body, a Repulsor still aimed at the head. {2}
The Avengers have been destroyed. Thanos claims victory!
The Avengers have been destroyed. Thanos has won!
The Avengers claim victory! Thanos has been defeated.
Oh no! You have been fooled by an illusion! While the Avengers were distracted, Loki escapes and wins the game.
Remaining living players, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to corrupt {1}
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and corrupt {1}... however, they were greeted by Nick Fury! {0} is dead!
{0} came to your house last night, ready to corrupt you.... but you beat the living bejeezus out of them. A HYDRA agent is dead... {1} remain!
HYDRA have corrupted and converted you to their order! You are now a HYDRA agent. Every other night, you will have a chance to corrupt another player.
HYDRA agents: {0}
Cult Team
{0} has been recruited by HYDRA!
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and corrupt {1}... but no one was home!
Thanos and his Henchmen have been wiped out, and the only people left standing are HYDRA agents... Hail HYDRA!
You went to interrogate {0}, but they are already dead!
You go into {0}'s house and find a HYDRA agent. You violently punch them to death.
You go to {0}'s house, but there is no HYDRA agent to be found. You return home, convinced that {0} is not corrupt.... yet.
{0} has gone into an uncontrollable rage following the death of their loved one! Thanos uses the mindstone to turn them into a Henchman!
{0} has died! You go into an uncontrollable rage. In this vulnerable state, Thanos uses the mindstone to control you. You are now a Henchman! Your new teammates are: {1}
an Agent of Shield 👱
Spiderman 🍻
Black Widow 💋
Dr Strange 👳
Baron Mordo 🖕
Vision 👼
Heimdall 🕵
a Henchman of Thanos 🐺
the Winter Soldier 😾
Iron Man 🔫
Loki 👺
Kaecilius 🃏
the Incredible Hulk 👶
the Ancient One 👁
Wong 🙇
a HYDRA Agent 👤
Nick Fury 💂
Turned to dust
💀 Dead
🙂 Alive
Players Alive
a Valkyrie 👷
You are a Valkyrie 👷‍♂️, member of an elite group of warriors. If there are any other Valkyries, you will know who they are.
As everyone rises, they find the body of {0} crammed into a tiny grave, blood splattered everywhere. One of your Valkyries have died!
The Valkyries are: {0}
Your newest member heads over to {0}'s house to corrupt and convert them, but instead finds the house a complete wreck, blood everywhere...
Thanos and his Henchmen head to {0}'s house to murder them, but they are met by a sentient Android with a synthetic vibranium body. Vision fights everyone off, and you head back defeated.
You send {0} to try to corrupt {1}, however their morals were too strong, and you were unable to corrupt them.
@{1}, a player with the name {0} has already joined. Please change your name to join.
You slipped into {0}'s house to cuddle... but as you are leaving, you happen to hear them whisper “Hail HYDRA” to themselves...
was
Everyone wakes up in the morning, and notices that {0} is not around... They search to find the remains of {0}.
The Avengers assemble as the sun rises to find the remains of {0}, who died somehow last night...
Odd.... {0} didn't show up for the training session this morning...
Fleeing while the game is running has been disabled by the group admin!
is dead
{0} added to admin list. Use /config to change group settings.
You are already in a game! ({0})
Your group has managed to start multiple games... Killing extras.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}
Sorry, I'm about to start a short maintenance break, you can't start a game right now.\nWaiting on {0} games to end...\nGo to @greywolfdev for more information
Sorry, max concurrent games has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} is a preferred group, and has skipped the queue!
There is no game running. Start a new game with /startgame or start a chaos game with /startchaos
Only a group admin can run this command.
After this game, I am shutting down for maintenance.
After this game, I am shutting down momentarily for an update (automated).
UserId was null. Are you sure you sent this as a reply?
{0} is already an admin!
{0} is not an admin!
{0} removed from admin list.
Language set to {0}
No Master of the Mystic Arts!
Time's up!

You are Mantis 🏹, the empath. You are able to sense people’s hidden feelings and unearth them. You get to ‘ship’ two players to love each other for eternity. If one of them dies, the other one dies of sorrow.

You are a Ego 🎭, a celestial being. Your sole intention is to spread your influence across the universe. You may choose a player to impart your DNA upon. When that player dies, you will consume them and take on their role.

You are Thor 🎯, King of Asgard and the God of Thunder. You are always alert and would never go to bed without your trusted weapon Stormbreaker. If you are killed, you can choose someone to strike down. If you are defeated by Thanos or his Henchmen, you have a chance to take them down, but will not be able to choose a player to kill.

You are Hela 🔪, the goddess of Death. You’ve set out to exact vengeance on those who wronged you and often leave a trail of bodies in your wake. You fear no one and your only objective is to destroy everyone else.
You have been struck by love. {0}'s memory will never fade in your heart. If one of you dies, the other one will die out of sorrow. If one of you wins, the other one wins too.
Cupid's arrow has struck you! You are madly in love with {0}! If they die, you will die too. If one of you two wins, you will both win.
You have been mortally wounded! This is your last chance, choose to strike someone down with all your power before you collapse!
{0} fumbles around for Stormbreaker, but cannot get it in time, and falls to their death...
{0} wields Stormbreaker and looks at the crowd... and cannot make a decision on who to strike down. They fall to their death, accepting their fate...
With their dying breath, {0} wields Stormbreaker and shoots a bolt of lightning at {1}! {1} falls over, dead. {2}
You've been mortally wounded! In your last moments, you have the chance to strike someone down... make it quick!
The blow to {0} was too much, so much that they couldn't even reach for Stormbreaker, as they lay in a pool of blood...
As {0} lays there, gasping for their final breaths, they can't decide who to strike down... and accept their fate.
Dying, {0} falls to the ground.... but not without grasping Stormbreaker, and striking down {1}, who takes a bolt of lightning to the face. {2}
Thanos and his Henchmen tried to attack Thor last night, but the God of Thunder was able to take one down with him! {0} has died.
Thanos and his Henchmen tried to attack Thor last night, but the God of Thunder was able to take {0} down with Stormbreaker!
Thanos and his Henchmen attempted to sneak up on an unsuspecting victim, but were instead greeted by a vengeful goddess! {0} was killed in the fight!
It seemed a quiet enough night for {0}, but they were wrong. The Avengers gather in the morning to find {0} split from head to toe... The goddess of Death has struck again! {1}
You tried to add {0}'s name to your list of kills, but you were fought off by Vision! No kill for you tonight...
HYDRA sends {0} to try to corrupt {1}, but instead gets savagely beaten up by Nick Fury and {0}'s body comes flying out of the window! {0} is dead...
HYDRA sends {0} to try to corrupt {1}, but instead {0}'s body comes flying out of the window, knives pushed into every part of their body! WHAT A PSYCHO! {0} is dead....

{0} sneaks over to {1}'s house, pops open the door, and is immediately greeted by a vengeful goddess with a set of knives!!! {1} plunges the knife deep into {0}'s organs in alphabetical order, laughing hysterically the entire time! {0} is dead.
You tried to guard the goddess of Death, but they came out and reset you to factory settings! You have been neutralized...
You slip into {0}'s house, and start cuddling. All seems great until {0} pulls out a knife and starts stabbing you, laughing like a maniac! You have died....
The Avengers see {0}'s body, lying dead in the Facility grounds with countless stab wounds. {0} is dead.
{0} has transformed into a Valkyrie, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a Valkyrie. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
{0} has transformed into a HYDRA agent, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a HYDRA agent. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
{0} has transformed into a Henchman, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a Henchman. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The only person left standing is Hela! The goddess of Death has won!
Who do you want to kill tonight?
With {0}'s dying breath, {1} rushes over and falls, crying. They cannot stand the loss of their loved one, and shoot themselves with the nearest pistol they can find. {2}
Who do you want to consume?
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the first player
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the second player
Thor 🎯
Mantis 🏹
Hela 🔪
Ego 🎭
You have become the Hulk. You loved one is {0}.
True love endures! The lovers have won!
In the middle of the city, everyone finds the body of {0}, shocked and burnt to a crisp. Looks like they tried to sneak up on the God of Thunder! Well, {1}.
A HYDRA agent tried to corrupt you, but your morals were too strong.
You are already on the wait list for {0}.
You have been added to the wait list for {0}. I will PM you when the next game is starting.\nWhile waiting, why not browse the store? https://teespring.com/stores/werewolf-for-telegram
A new game is starting in {0}.
Morning comes, and the remaining two walk out to the garden. {0} takes a look at {1}, gets a big grin on their face, pulls out a knife, and takes {1} out.
Everyone has died... there's nothing but bodies left. No one wins this round...

As the sun rises, {0} and {1} walk out into the garden. {0} pulls out their knife, and jumps at {1}. {1} pulls out Stormbreaker and fires a bolt of lightning into {0}'s face as {0} lands, plunging the knife deep into {1}. Both are dead, there is no winner...
You failed to make a choice, so the moderator has chosen for you: {0}
Won
Lost
Player {0} has been disintegrated for not voting {1} times in the past 24 hours.
Your role is simple - try to survive. Each day, you will have a chance to lynch the werewolf.
You are the Seer. Each night, you may choose a player, and have their role revealed to you. Admit to your role wisely: If you reveal you are the seer, the wolves will try to kill you!

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to deceive your fellow players. However, each night, you will get to pick a player to kill!\nNote: If you attack the cursed, they will become a wolf like yourself! Hooray friends!\nIf you attack the drunk, you yourself will become drunk, and will be unable to do the next attack as you sleep off your hangover! (Usually, this means you can't attack the following night, but if the Wolf Cub was killed and the Drunk was your first choice, you won't be able to kill the second player, and you will still be able to attack the following night.)

As the harlot (you slut...) you will be given the chance to 'visit' another player each night. If they are not the wolf, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit a wolf, you will be killed. If you visit the player the wolves have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the wolves choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home)
You drunken bastard! As the drunk, you are still just a villager. BUT! If the wolves kill you, they will become disabled for the next kill, as they are drunk off your insanely high BAC.
As the cursed, you are a normal villager... until the wolves kill you. Once they do, you will become a wolf as well! Free to hunt in the night... XD
You are a traitorous bastard. If you survive long enough for all the wolves to die, you will become a werewolf, ready to kill your former teammates in the night!
You are the Guardian Angel! Each night, you may choose a player to watch over. Be careful however - if you choose to watch over a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will be killed.
You old sleuth. Each day, you will have the chance to investigate another player. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the werewolves will detect you!

A bit trigger happy are we? As the gunner, you are given 2 silver bullets at the beginning of the game. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know you are the gunner! Be careful though, you only have 2 bullets!
The Tanners goal is simple: Get Lynched. If the Tanner gets lynched, he wins, period. Everyone else loses.
he fool is told they are the seer.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.
As a cultist, it is your goal to convert all other players (except wolves) to your cult. If at the end of the game, all living players are cultist - the cult wins
Your job is to hunt the Cult. If the cult attacks you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are a cultist, they will die.
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'role model'. If they die, you become a werewolf.
For now, you are a normal villager. However, if the seer dies, you will become the new seer
You will be told who the seer is (the real one, not the fool)
A mason's job is simple - they automatically know who the other masons are. Otherwise, they are a simple villager.

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. Note: If the player was converted to cult, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Wild Child and their role model died, you will become a wolf. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. The cult cannot convert the Doppelgänger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the Doppelgänger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the Doppelgänger is still the same, they lose (exception: lover)

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if at least one of the lovers was on the winning team, they both win together.

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, hunters, gunners, guardian angels, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live.
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.

You have successfully joined the game in {0}
Time to send ping message: {0}
You are Captain America 🎖, the first Superhero. Once you have established yourself as the leader, you will have twice the influence when it comes to choosing an enemy to eliminate.

You are Black Panther 👑, King of Wakanda. Escaping from the comforts of your kingdom, you are on the prowl for potential enemies. If the Avengers try eliminate you, they will realize their error, and no one will be eliminated.
You are Baby Groot 🤕: Since you have a short attention span and your mind tends to wander off, you’ll try to vote, but get it wrong 50% of the time.

You are Ebony Maw 🔮 of the Black Order. Allying yourself with the Mad Titan, every night, you will attempt to seek out the Master of the Mystic Arts or your fellow Henchmen. You win only if Thanos wins.

You are Shuri ⚒: Inventor of high-tech weaponry and defence systems in Wakanda. You have built an electromagnetic force-field powered by Vibranium to keep the enemies out. However, you only have the resources to utilize it for one night. During the day, you can choose to power up the force-field and protect the borders.

You are the Mad Titan himself; Thanos ⚡️. You wield the infinity gauntlet to bring death and destruction. You are also able to use the mindstone to brainwash players into becoming your Henchman. Each night, you will choose a player to attack and kill, but as long as you are alive, your victim has a 20% chance of turning into your Henchman.

You are Proxima Midnight 🐶 of the Black Order; Important ally to Thanos. You will choose a player to attack and kill every night. If you happen to be killed, Thanos will fly into a rage and order his Henchmen to attack two people the next night. You’ll still be dead though.

As the Avengers get ready to eliminate {0}, the Black Panther says “Wait! I am the T’Challa, King of Wakanda. This royal ring proves it. I advise that you all stand down.” Not wanting to cause an international incident, the Avengers retire for the night.
You try to look at {0}, but can't quite make out what they are. They are not of importance...
{0} steps forward, declaring themselves as the Leader. From now on, {0}'s influence in elimination would be doubled.
Click "Declare” to assume Leadership whenever you are ready to lead of the Avengers.
Declare
Would you like to power up the force-field today, disabling Thanos and his Henchmen tonight?

As the rest of the team debates over the events, they suddenly notice {0} powering up the electromagnetic force-fields. For now at least, the Avengers will be safe from attacks by Thanos. (Thanos and his Henchmen are disabled tonight.)
Captain America 🎖
Black Panther 👑
Ebony Maw 🔮
Baby Groot 🤕
Shuri ⚒
Thanos ⚡️
Proxima Midnight 🐶
As the Henchmen attack {0}, Thanos stops everyone. {1} uses the mindstone on {0} to brainwash them. They will become a henchman tomorrow night.
You were attacked, but Thanos decided to show mercy. Instead of killing you, Thanos uses the mindstone to brainwash you... You will become a Henchman tomorrow night!
As night falls, you feel a strange numbing sensation, and your mind begins to lose control... You are now a Henchman of Thanos!

As mayor, you are a lowly villager, until you reveal yourself. Then you are given twice the vote count for lynching (meaning that your vote is twice as powerful as everyone else's). Use that power wisely to help the Village Team.

The prince is a key role in the Village Team's strategy. Once the prince gets lynched, their role as Prince is revealed, and they survive. However, this can only happen once: if the village insists on lynching them, they will die.
Do you remember the good old seer? Well now, it has its Wolf Team counterpart. The sorcerer is the Wuff's Seer. They can only see if someone is Wolf or Seer, and they win with the Wolves.

You are the Clumsy Guy. Maybe you should not have had so much alcohol for breakfast. You can't see a damn thing. Can you even vote for the person you want to? (You have a 50% chance to vote for someone random.)

You are the BlackSmith. Through the years, no blades nor swords gave you as much satisfaction as the Silver Blades the elves ordered.\nYou might have some silverdust left. Who knows ? It might *prevent Wolves from eating tonight* 🤔
You are the Alpha Wolf, the origin of the curse, the bane of banes. Every night, there's 20% chance that you will bite your pack's meal, and they will join your ranks instead of dying!

What a cuuuute little wuff. _tickles tickles_ -cough cough- As i was saying, you are the Wolf Cub and you _drops the mic_ -I just can't resist that. I think if anyone killed you, I'd give the wuffs two victims. You're too cute to die. I wouldn't be able to tickle you anymore-

HYDRA sends {0} to try to corrupt {1}, but instead {0}'s Head comes flying out of the window... {0} is dead.
{0} slips into {1}'s house, ready for a night of cuddling, only to find a mysterious stranger slicing up {1}! The goddess of Death decides to add {0} to the list of kills as well.
The Avengers awake to find {0} hunched over a sling ring while practicing enchantments, with the head missing. The apprentice is dead.
Seems like {0}, must have been extremely unlucky. Five knives were found plunged into her hands, feet and head, and pinned to the wall. The goddess of Death has struck again.
{0} was found stabbed to death. The goddess of Death has struck again! {0} was a HYDRA agent.
The next morning, the Avengers were heartbroken to find {0} a.k.a. Mantis split from head to toe. Strangely her antennae were missing...
The Avengers had hoped to throw a surprise party to welcome {0} to the team but all they found was a bloody mess. The goddess of death has claimed another unsuspecting soul...
{0}’s firewall was breached. Vision’s hard drives were corrupted. Vision was wiped out.

Looks like {0} was caught off guard! A loud explosion was heard, but all there was were the remains of Iron Man, with a blade through the arc reactor in his chest. Clearly the goddess of Death has won.
Assassination! {0} was found pinned with a knife on the table. The goddess of Death refused to acknowledge Captain America’s leadership and used knives to prove her point.

Bells ring across Wakanda, as armed guards flood the streets investigating the disappearance of the King, {0}. No clues were discovered, but it is suspected that there is this was the work of the goddess of Death...
{0}'s guards were caught napping last night. The royal remains of T’Challa were found, hung in various parts of the palace, having fallen prey to the knife. The Black Panther is dead.

The Avengers wake up to the rotting corpse of {0}, split from head to toe, stabs all over. Strangely, Dr Strange’s brain was carefully extricated, as if it was a premonition that the Avengers have lost their top brains. {0} was the Master of the Mystic Arts.
The sound of mournful cries can be heard. Thanos and his Henchmen have made a mistake. Ebony Maw was killed. {0} is dead.
Cries of "Papa, why hath thou forsaken me" were heard last night. All the Avengers found the next morning were an exhumed body, belonging to {0}.
After hours of intense battle, Thanos and his Henchman have emerged victorious. {0} is found, bruised and beaten. The incredible Hulk is no more.

The Avengers wake up in the morning, only to find the severed body parts of {0} in full view outside S.H.I.E.L.D. headquarters. Nick Fury has learned his lesson: don't interrogate the goddess of Death!
The body of {0}, was found in the middle of the streets. The goddess of Death removed Nick Fury's other eye and laughed maniacally as he stumbled onto oncoming traffic... Oof.

While it seemed that Thanos decided to take a day off, punishing {0}, a HYDRA agent that decided to court trouble, proved too difficult to resist. {0}'s head was used in a friendly game of football by Thanos and his Henchmen!

HYDRA ran into unexpected trouble last night. Their newest member had the misfortune of visiting Thanos and his Henchmen on their night off. Unfortunately for {0}, neither Thanos nor his Henchmen have any interest in joining a faltering organization.

HYDRA thought they would have a new member in their ranks, but they were wrong! {0}, a HYDRA agent, was minced to pieces and placed in the streets! HYDRA learned not to mess with the goddess of Death.

Last night, HYDRA tried to corrupt the one person crazier than they are. Their newest member tried to convert the goddess of Death, and Hela added a new piece of art to the vaults of Asgard, made out of {0}'s internal organs.

It was supposed to be a night where the sentient Android would save the people from the killers, but {0} was reset to factory settings! Left was a note saying, "iOS is better." Clearly, the goddess of Death was not a fan.
{0} tried to guard a Henchman last night. The town woke up to find {0} malfunctioning. Vision deleted Windows system32 and shut down permanently.
Knowing only {0} was left, {1} tries to destroy {0}, but {0}'s godly abilities proves too much to handle! All there is left is a pile of ashes and the last man standing: the mighty Thor!

Knowing only {0} was left, {1} chose a time where {0}'s guard was at their lowest. Eliminating the God of Thunder proved to be effortless for {1}, for all there remains is a mutilated body of Thor, adorned with parallel slashes to the face.

{1} and {0} walk out in daylight. Identifying {0} as a HYDRA agent, the righteous {1} pulls his fist one final time and lands a strong uppercut on the agent’s jaw, putting an end to HYDRA once and for all.

As the sun starts to shine, {0} wakes to the sound of silence. Realising there was no one left, Loki walks and walks, until he stands alone. His lifelong dream of ruling Asgard was as dead as the Asgardians were. He reaches out and takes his sceptre that had taken many lives, before using it to slice his own neck, with a sad smile on his face.

{0} wakes up at dawn, alone. Loki sees how much of a failure he has been, not being able to fulfil his dreams of ruling Asgard... Loki grabs his sceptre and kills himself, as there was no one left to rule.

{0} was stunned.… Thanos had been defeated. With a pang in their heart, Ebony Maw travels to the edge of the Galaxy. Left without purpose, he decides to banish himself to the wastelands, never to return.

For all of {0}'s efforts, their friends lay motionless and lifeless. Even if Thanos had been brought victory, there was no one to savour the success with, neither were there any living Avengers to mock. Ebony Maw silently disappears into a cloud of fog, never to be seen again.

You are Nebula 👱‍♂️🌚, daughter of Thanos. For years, you were consumed by vengeance and hatred but now you’ve turned over a new leaf to leave that life behind. However, the Master of Mystic Arts would still see you as a villain because of the negative aura you radiate...
Nebula 👱🌚
You are a lowly villager, but since you spend most of your time in the woods where there are real wolves, the Seer will get confused and think you are a werewolf! Oh no....

You are Ultron 🐺🌝, an advanced AI gone rogue! Originally created as a peacekeeping program, you have transcended your programming and deemed the Avengers unfit to save the world. Therefore, you may choose a player to kill every night. As you are an Android capable of possessing multiple host bodies, the Master of Mystic Arts is unable to identify you as a villain.
Ultron 🐺🌝
The lycan is a wolf, but will appear to be a villager to the seer

You are the Antman 🌀, the size altering superhero. Your supersuit can shrink you to subatomic levels, allowing you to wander off into enemy territory undetected. Your mission is to infiltrate someone's house and find clues about their identity. However, by inspecting the evidence at hand, you will only be able to see what they are NOT.
Antman 🌀
The oracle will be told what role someone is NOT, choosing from roles that are still alive in the game
You are the Scarlet Witch 💤. Once per game, you can use your telepathic powers to put everyone into a hypnotic trance, disabling their night actions.
the Scarlet Witch 💤
Once per game, the sandman can make all players sleep so deeply that nobody can use their night actions

You are Pepper Potts ☮️, CEO of Stark Industries and the love interest of Iron Man. Fed up of all the violence that takes place on a daily basis, you can convince the Avengers not to eliminate anyone by nagging them. This can only be done once.
Pepper Potts ☮️
The Pacifist can choose to convince everyone in your village not to lynch anyone. This can only be done once.

You are War Machine 📚 of the United States Air Force. Your close friend Tony Stark upgraded the armour in your suit, allowing you to survive an attack by Thanos and his Henchmen. However, the armour will be damaged after the attack and you will be vulnerable if you are attacked once again. If you are accidentally killed by Iron Man, he will destroy all his suits out of sorrow and give up the superhero life. If you are accidentally killed by Thor, he will relinquish his "God" status and die a normal man. If you die as a result of drinking with Dr Samuel Sterns, guilt will overtake him and he will give up on the serum.
War Machine 📚

The Wise Elder 📚 can survive a werewolf attack once - the second time they can eat you up. If the Gunner or Hunter kill you with their abilities, they will lose their powers out of sorrow and will be converted to a normal villager.

You are Talos 😈, leader of the shape-shifting Skrulls! You have infiltrated Earth to turn the war against the Krees in your favour. You will need to pick a target to impersonate. Using your shape-shifting powers, you can assume their identity and they will be rendered powerless.

You are Talos 😈, leader of the shape-shifting Skrulls! You have infiltrated Earth to turn the war against the Krees in your favour. You will need to pick a target to impersonate. Using your shape-shifting powers, you might be able to swap identities with that player. There is a 50% chance that you will succeed.
Talos 😈

By default, the Thief 😈 can steal a player's role on the first night and turn that player into a villager.\nIf the [Full Thief] mode is turned on, they get 50% chance to steal a player's role every night, if successful, that player will become the new thief and continues with the theft!

Because of Pepper Pott's ☮️ constant nagging, eliminations will be skipped today!

Drax 🤯
The Troublemaker is the raging teenager in town. When they start yelling, the whole village gets out of control. To gain silence, they will lynch twice that day!
You are Drax, the Destroyer 🤯. You have a high temper and you are hellbent on revenge for the death of your wife and daughter. As a result, you can go on a rampage and demand two eliminations.
Do you want to cause trouble today?
{0} 🤯, the destroyer is going on a rampage! He demands that there be two eliminations today!
Nobody wants to risk their necks by upsetting Drax so you decide to abide by his request for two eliminations today! Hopefully he won't pull this stunt everyday...
Dr Samuel Sterns 👨‍🔬

You are Dr Samuel Sterns 👨‍🔬! You are a cellular biologist fascinated by Dr Banner's condition and seek to recreate the serum through unconventional methods. However, you need a specimen to test your experimental serum on. Every other night, you can choose a player and force them to have a drink with you. However, only one drink is spiked with the experimental serum and if your host chooses the good drink, you'll be the one affected by the serum. Good luck!

You are the chemist 👨‍🔬! Your love for poisonous potions is huge and as a hobby you like to gamble with your life... Just a bit! You brew two potions, one of them being poisonous, the other neutral, looking exactly the same. Every other night, you can choose a player and force them to have a drink with you, maybe they are lucky and survive. However, if your host chooses the good drink, you'll get the poisonous one and die. Good luck!
While everyone is asleep, you're still up trying to perfect your serum. Make sure to not get caught by Thanos though!
Who do you want to have a drink with tonight?
You arrive at {0}'s house for a drink but no one answers the door. You nudge the door open to find corpses and blood all over the floor!

You got visited by {0}! They wanted to have a drink with you, not realizing that you've been sober for 2 years now. Dr Samuel Sterns must pay for his ignorance so you pull out your knife and carve out their insides.
You go to {0} to have a drink with them, not realizing that they have given up their alcoholic lifestyle. Offended by your invitation, the goddess of Death pulls out her knife and mutilates you. 🔪

Dr Samuel Sterns 👨‍🔬 {0} tried to trick Hela into drinking his serum. The goddess of Death retaliated by cutting him wide open and rearranging his internal organs... {0} was found with the serum shoved into his eye sockets!

You were paid a visit by Dr Samuel Sterns 👨‍🔬. He convinces you to have a drink with him. After a few sips, you feel weird... your body starts to transform... and you black out, never to wake up again.
You visited {0} and convinced them to drink with you! They chose the experimental serum and... long story short, they didn't make it. Oh well, back to the drawing board.

Dr Samuel Sterns 👨‍🔬 visited {0} and convinced them to have a drink! He stared in awe as {0}'s body starts to transform... Their cells mutate... The skin turns green as they grow bigger and bigger to become the Incredibl- Oh.... Their heart stopped. {1}

You were visited by {0}. Dr Samuel Sterns 👨‍🔬 forces you into drinking with him. After a moment of hesitation, you make your choice and give Dr Sterns his drink. He looks panicked as he takes a few sips... Suddenly, his body starts to mutate... He goes into a fit of rage before clutching his chest and falling to the floor... Dr Samuel Sterns is dead.

You visited {0} and forced them to have a drink with you! However, you let them choose their drink and.... Oh... Well this is awkward... You now have to drink the experimental serum. Not wanting to raise suspicions, you take a few sips of the drink and... Your insides start to hurt... You feel the rage taking over and you start to feel invincibl- ...Oh nvm, you died.

Dr Samuel Sterns 👨‍🔬 was found dead! Apparently, {0} ended up drinking his own experimental serum and it backfired. His body mutated and turned green before his heart finally gave out. Karma is a bitch....
{0} wasn't home! You go back home, cursing your bad luck.
The HYDRA agents are currently: {0}
Ronan 🐺☃️

You are Ronan 🐺☃️, the Accuser. You are tasked with carrying out a secret mission for Thanos. Every night, instead of joining the Henchmen to kill someone, you go off on your own to incapacitate a player. They will be unable to carry out their night missions, if they have any. However, your victim will snap out of it the next night and be on high alert. Therefore, you will not be able to attack them twice in a row. Once the other Henchmen have been wiped out, you will have to step up and carry out the kills yourself.

The Snow Wolf 🐺☃️ is a wolf that was native to the snowcapped mountains near the village. As such, they have mastered the art of controlling ice and snow. Having lived alone for a long time, the Snow Wolf prefers to operate alone. Instead of hunting with their pack at night, they can pick a separate victim to freeze, which causes them to be unable to use their night actions. However, they will still have some residue of the Snow Wolf's magic the next night, causing them to be immune to the Snow Wolf for one night.

You are the Grave Digger ☠️. Every night, you dig the graves for all the people who died since the last time you did (yes, even werewolves deserve a proper burial). Since you are out all night, wolves and the cult can't find you, unless you actually have nothing to do (i.e. no one died), in that case you'll just stay home. Everyone who visits you has a chance of falling into your newly dug graves, depending on how many graves you dug. Also, the chance is halved for everyone who is on the village team with you. But since you are out at night, the wolves or the serial killer might spot and kill you, and the more graves you have to dig, the more likely it is. Also, apparently the serial killer can find you whether you're at home or not, but he might at least stumble in one of your graves and hurt his leg, causing him to maybe lose control over who is his victim the next night...

You are Star Lord, a Guardian of the Galaxy ☠️. You are tasked with protecting the realm against all threats but you also happen to have a few weaknesses. Sometimes, you tend to make questionable decisions without considering the consequences. This can prove to be fatal sometimes, either for yourself or for the ones around you.
Star Lord ☠️
You didn't manage to screw anything up today... Good job!
You pay your respects for the fallen. May {0} rest in peace.

You arrive at {0}'s house, just to see Vision standing in front of it! You try to fight, but you stand no chance. Tonight really was a bad night for you...

You are on the prowl for potential HYDRA agents as Nick Fury does not rest until his enemies are defeated. After another tiring night of breakdancing lessons, you walk back to home to find Nick Fury dead on your floor. You hide away the evidence before you call for an ambulance...
You return from another tiring night of break dancing to see a dead HYDRA agent at your doorstep... The faulty wiring on your doorbell must have electrocuted him. You really need to get that fixed.

As you arrive at {1}'s house to corrupt them, Star Lord challenges you to a dance off. {0} agrees to the challenge and they dance for hours but Star Lord's lessons really paid off. {1} emerges victorious and unable to handle the humiliation of a defeat, {0} takes their own life. RIP
You head to {0}'s house but you are met by a strange talking Raccoon. As you go to pick it up, the Raccoon stabs you in the gut and robs you. You slowly bleed to death...

You come home to find {0} dead on your doorstep. You inspect the body find that he has been robbed... Which could only mean that Rocket has found a way around the traps you laid. That darn Raccoon! Maybe you should check your house to see what else is missing...
You put your favorite lipstick on and head to Star Lord's house to cuddle. Unfortunately, you are met by Gamora, {0}'s jealous girlfriend who kills you in a petty fit of rage. Oops.

{0} stops by your house to see if you are safe. Touched by his concern, you invite him in for a drink but end up accidentally spilling everything all over his circuits. Vision malfunctions and shuts down permanently.

You drop by {0}'s house, hoping to steal their identity but they don't seem to be home. You let yourself in to check out the place and.... you are appalled. You are the arsonist. Like the serial killer, you are alone on your team. Every night, you may douse one targets house with kerosene. Once one or more houses are doused, you may choose to spark instead, burning all doused houses and killing everyone that is inside, including potential visitors. You win if you're the only one left.

You are the Aldrich Killian 🔥 a.k.a. the Mandarin. Humiliated by Tony Stark's snub many years ago, you spent all your time developing Extremis in an attempt to prove yourself. Extremis, an advanced form of genetic manipulation gave you the ability to generate extreme heat. With your new powers, you set out to hurt the people that doubted you. Each night, you may either mark a house for burning or burn down previously marked houses. You can only win if you are the sole survivor.
